text: Elisabeta Polihroniade (24 April 1935 - 23 January 2016) was a Romanian chess player and journalist. She became a Woman Grandmaster in 1982. She was also an International Arbiter. She won the Romanian Women's Championship in 1966, 1970, 1971, 1972, 1975, 1976 and 1977. She was born in Bucharest. Polihroniade died on 23 January 2016, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Elisabeta Polihroniade chess games at 365Chess.com Category:1935 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Chess players Category:Romanian journalists Category:Sportspeople from Bucharest Category:Writers from Bucharest
title: Elisabeta Polihroniade
